title: Redfall is Pretty Much Dead
description:
Redfall might never be playable again once they take it offline. :( Also, what's going on with Perfect Dark?! 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L7W2rB19CU0 

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: Arcane Austin was working on a big redfall update for May before Microsoft ditched the game and closed the studio this comes from Wesley inpo at IGN the now abandoned redfall has a road map of support that was being actively worked on before Microsoft scrapped all development and closed its developer IGN can reveal Arcane Austin was working on DLC and updates for the game with the expectation they would release until very recently ien understands suggesting Microsoft's internal announcement today that it was closing the developers as well as Hi-Fi Rush Studio Tango GameWorks came as a shock to staff IGN was told that the now canell hero pass content which was set to add two new characters to the vampire Co-op shooter was scheduled for release this Halloween if it had come out then the hero pass would have released a year and a half after redf fall suffered a disastrous launch and with an Ever shrinking player base there's now fresh concern that the always online redfall could become

pass would have released a year and a half after redf fall suffered a disastrous launch and with an Ever shrinking player base there's now fresh concern that the always online redfall could become unplayable if and when Microsoft shuts its servers off in March last year ahead of redf Falls release Arcane Austin said it was working on a fix that would reverse redf Fall's always online requirement an aspect was met with backlash when first announced in an interview with Euro gamer game director Harvey Smith said quote we listen and we've already started work to address this in the future we have to do some things like encrypt your save games and do a bunch of UI work to support it and so we're looking into it I'm not supposed to promise anything but we're looking into it and working actively toward fixing it in the future however that offline mode failed to materialize IGN understands red Falls May update would have added the ability to play offline which in turn would have helped with

toward fixing it in the future however that offline mode failed to materialize IGN understands red Falls May update would have added the ability to play offline which in turn would have helped with keeping the game alive in the future unfortunately for players it will never see the light of day this is so sad man yeah I think for me it's the again the thing that really sticks with me is the idea that because they are not able to finish this offline feature if they do pull it the people who have spent money on this game will never be able to play it again that kills me because now you it's and look don't get me wrong you know we we spend money on things that kind of appear and disappear but there's something about games man there's something about the idea of being being able to it's like buying a DVD of a film you know and kind of holding it and and keeping it as yours and I know a lot of the conversations at the moment are with with digital as well specifically this idea of is it
